message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of pilot contamination in uplink MIMO systems, which is a key issue in wireless communication and falls under the domain of information theory (cs.IT). The proposed approach makes use of location information of mobile devices, which is a key aspect of networking and falls under the domain of networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also proposes various pilot coordination methods for multi-user multi-cell scenarios, which involves system-level optimization and falls under the domain of control and systems engineering (cs.SY). The paper also deals with the problem of massive MIMO, which is a subfield of machine learning and falls under the domain of multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach to solving a key problem in wireless communication, which is of interest to the machine learning community and falls under the domain of machine learning (cs.LG).
